Skills

Beginning my coding journey in 2020 I have been able to learn a plethora of skills in a short period of time. Through a coding bootcamp, I have spent four months studying and practicing full time between twelve to fourteen hours a day. Eight hours of class with consistent four or more hours of assignments each night has given me the ability to learn the skills neccessary to create fantastic, functional applications. The scores I am giving myself is how comfortable I feel whether it be conceptually or practically. 1 being uncomfortable and 10 being very comfortable.
